requirements.summary: Increase image dimensions in gallery artwork cards to make them significantly larger while maintaining list layout with images filling containers and titles below
acceptanceCriteria: Images in the gallery list are noticeably larger than the previous version
Images fill their container width completely
Artwork titles remain positioned directly below each image within the same card
List layout is preserved with proper spacing between items

file_operations.description: Increase the image container dimensions by modifying the aspect ratio or height constraints to make images significantly larger. Update the container styling to ensure images fill their width completely while maintaining the card structure with titles positioned below the image. Preserve the existing clickable behavior, SOLD badge/watermark overlays, and responsive design patterns.

Adjust the grid or list container styling if needed to accommodate larger artwork cards while maintaining the list layout structure. Ensure proper spacing between enlarged cards and that the filtering controls and sold display mode functionality remain unchanged. Verify that the layout remains responsive and the upload button placement is preserved.
